name: Sourabh Sah
tagline: An AI-driven mind with a builder's spirit.
bio: Sourabh Sah is an M.Tech student in Computer Science and Engineering (Data Science & AI) with a relentless drive to excel in Python, machine learning, and artificial intelligence. He's focused on mastering DSA and building powerful, meaningful projects that can leave an impact.
goals: Crack top-tier placements with strong DSA and ML fundamentals
Develop a robust GitHub portfolio with real-world projects
Stay ahead of the curve in emerging AI/ML trends

projects.name: Mamba Chatbot
projects.description: A lightweight AI chatbot powered by Mamba-based LLM, served via FastAPI and visualized using Streamlit. Includes chat history, Docker deployment, and Gemma fallback integration.

projects.name: Portfolio Bot
projects.description: An AI assistant embedded in Sourabh’s portfolio that answers questions about his journey, skills, and philosophy using limited context.

philosophy: Focus on fundamentals — everything else builds on top.
limitations: This assistant cannot guess or predict future decisions.
It won't discuss private, speculative, or off-topic questions.
It only knows what Sourabh has shared in his public knowledge base.
